meanings.definition: A group of seven offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The hospital was abuzz with excitement when the septuplets were born.
meanings.sent2: The family was overjoyed to welcome septuplets into the world.
meanings.sent3: The septuplets kept the parents on their toes with their constant giggles.
meanings.sent4: The septuplets were like a rainbow, bringing color and joy into the family's life.
meanings.sent5: The septuplets' arrival was a miracle that filled the house with laughter.

meanings.definition: A set of seven similar things.
meanings.sent1: The store offered a discount on a septuplets of colorful pens.
meanings.sent2: She collected a septuplets of different stamps for her album.
meanings.sent3: The septuplets of cupcakes on the table looked too tempting to resist.
meanings.sent4: The septuplets of flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully in unison.
meanings.sent5: The septuplets of books on the shelf created a colorful display in the room.
